YiiXL - The Yii Extension Library Of Doom!

1.0.0pre-alpha

YiiXL

Visit YiiXL web site to find more information about this project.

Installation

Install

Configure

    Yii::setPathOfAlias( 'yiixl', '/path/to/your/install' );

Import what you want!

    'import' => array(
      ...
      ...
      //  YiiXL
      'yiixl.core.*',
      'yiixl.ui.jquery.*',
      ...
      ...
    ),

Code Responsibly!
